Lde/ecspride/MainActivity;->onCreate:(La: The method retrieves the device ID (IMEI) via TelephonyManager.getDeviceId(), processes it into a substring, and logs it using android.util.Log.d. The IMEI is also sent via SMS using android.telephony.SmsManager.sendTextMessage. Both logging and SMS transmission are identified as sinks, so no further method calls are tracked.
